## Connection.getRecentPerformanceSamples() method

Fetch recent performance samples

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRecentPerformanceSamples(limit?: number): Promise<Array<PerfSample>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  limit | number | optional limit of samples returned, defaults to 720. |
